com.thindeck.api

Interface Base

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DyBase, FkBase

    @Immutable
public interface Base
    Base of the entire system.

    Base is an entry point to the entire object model of the system. You start from getting an instance of this type from somewhere (depends on the implementation) and then use one of the users or decks.

    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@teamed.io)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterable<Deck> active()
      Get active decks, no matter what users they belong to.
      User user(String name)
      Get user by name.

    • Method Detail

      • user

        @NotNull(message="user can\'t be null")
User user(String name)
        Get user by name.

        If the user is absent, it should be automatically created and returned.

        Parameters:
        name - His name
        Returns:
        User found or created

      • active

        @NotNull(message="Decks can\'t be null")
Iterable<Deck> active()
                      throws IOException
        Get active decks, no matter what users they belong to.

        This method is used only by a system-wide routine procedure that goes through ALL decks.

        Returns:
        Decks
        Throws:
        IOException - If fails
